name: Flash Flood (mrchrissross)
description:
Before playing, ensure you have correctly set your controls in the settings menu.  

The game is still currently in development and will be for a little while longer. This is a version of the game that is yet to be released to google play. 

The next update to google play will have ten levels available. After this update, work will continue and each time ten extra levels have been completed, a new patch will be released to the google play store.

This WebGL version will not receive any additional levels. The full game is intended for google play.
